name: Floral Sidewinder
title: Collei: Floral Sidewinder
desc: Never underestimate Collei, and never underestimate her cat.

source: Reward for inviting Collei to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is $[A1701], equip this card.
After $[A1701] equips this card, immediately use $[S17012] once.
After your $[A1701], who has this card equipped, uses $[S17012], during this Round, when your characters' Skills trigger Dendro-Related Reactions: Deal 1 Dendro DMG. (Once per Round)
(You must have $[A1701] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
